biocontainers.name: ggd
biocontainers.summary: Gogetdata (ggd) is a genomic data managment system. it provide simple and reproducible access to a repository of genomic data. simply put, it is 'conda' for genomic data

biotools.summary: Go Get Data (GGD) is a framework that facilitates reproducible access to genomic data.

bioschemas.name: GGD
bioschemas.summary: Go Get Data (GGD) is a framework that facilitates reproducible access to genomic data.
